title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Clearly define the scope of NeuralDataCompressor, focusing on its primary use cases: data compression and storage for neural patterns. Detail the desired functionalities, which include efficient compression algorithms, scalability, compatibility with various neural network architectures (such as Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, and Autoencoders), and real-time data processing capabilities. Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) for measuring success, such as compression ratio, speed of compression/decompression, memory usage, system stability under heavy load, energy efficiency, and latency. Include support for popular machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and MXNet in the compatibility list. Additionally, consider integrating data visualization tools for better understanding and interpretation of compressed data. Update the task to emphasize the need for modular design for easier integration with existing systems. Lastly, discuss potential security considerations and solutions.

title: Design Overall System Architecture
description: Develop an overall system architecture for the NeuralDataCompressor, considering frontend, backend, compression algorithms, and storage solutions.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for uploading, visualizing, and managing data within NeuralDataCompressor.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Create the necessary backend services for handling data processing, compression, storage, and retrieval.

title: Develop Compression Algorithms
description: Research and develop efficient neural-pattern-based compression algorithms suitable for the intended use cases.

title: Integrate Compression Algorithms into the System
description: Integrate developed compression algorithms into the frontend and backend of NeuralDataCompressor.

title: Implement Data Storage and Retrieval Solutions
description: Design and implement a scalable data storage solution that allows for efficient compression, retrieval, and management of compressed neural patterns.

title: Write Documentation for the Project
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the NeuralDataCompressor project, including design decisions, API documentation, and usage instructions.

title: Perform Initial Testing and Integration Checks
description: Test the NeuralDataCompressor for functionality, performance, and any integration issues.
dependencies: Integrate Compression Algorithms into the System
